channel.title: MYB

item.title: The Yakuza Helpline Hack—Are 2,500 Ex-Gangsters And Victims In Danger?
item.description: A Japanese government agency running a helpline for victims of the Yakuza, including former gang members, has confirmed it has been hacked.

item.title: ‘A Man On The Inside’ Is One Of The Best Netflix Shows Of 2024, And Ted Danson Has Never Been Better
item.description: The new show from 'Parks and Rec' and 'The Good Place' creator Michael Schur is absolutely delightful.

item.description: We’re still seeing a lot of disruption and change in major industries toward the end of a banner year for new automations.
